segments.text: What experience do you have with office machinery ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know how to use the telex machine , the photocopier , and the word processor . By the way , I took a computer course in university .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do you want to be in five years ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to be a manager .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nothing . I think I'll take the job .
segments.speaker: S2
